name: Multi-Timeframe VWAP Trend Shift Equity Momentum
description: Intraday momentum strategy for highly-liquid U.S. large-cap equities. Long entries are driven by the ‘Multi-Timeframe VWAP Trend Shift’ signal on 15-minute bars with daily confirmation; exits use VWAP close, a 1.2 % protective stop, or a 2 % profit target. Position sizing allocates 1.5 % of equity per trade with a four-position cap (handled at portfolio level).
